sn8.11:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava campayam viharati gaggaraya pokkharaniya tire mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim pancamattehi bhikkhusatehi sattahi ca upasakasatehi sattahi ca upasikasatehi anekehi ca devatasahassehi.
sn8.11:1.2: Tyassudam bhagava atirocati vannena ceva yasasa ca.
sn8.11:1.4: “ayam kho bhagava campayam viharati gaggaraya pokkharaniya tire mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim pancamattehi bhikkhusatehi sattahi ca upasakasatehi sattahi ca upasikasatehi anekehi ca devatasahassehi.
sn8.11:1.5: Tyassudam bhagava atirocati vannena ceva yasasa ca.
sn8.11:1.6: Yannunaham bhagavantam sammukha saruppaya gathaya abhitthaveyyan”ti.
sn8.11:2.1: Atha kho ayasma vangiso utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn8.11:2.4: Atha kho ayasma vangiso bhagavantam sammukha saruppaya gathaya abhitthavi:
